      • ensureAllowChargingSms

        void ensureAllowChargingSms(MemberSmsStatus memberSmsStatus,
                          boolean hasNotificationsBySms)
        Ensure the sms status has the "allow charging sms" flag set correctly.
        If there isn't free sms, the additional charged package's size is one and the member accept any feature by sms then the flag is set to true.
